title: Computer Society Distinguished Lecturer Program Speaker – Prof Tulika Mitra
description: On the 13 th August 2018, NITK IEEE invited Prof. Tulika Mitra from National University of Singapore from IEEE Computer Society to deliver a talk on “Mobile Heterogeneous Computing” and it was attended by over 300 students who gained insight towards this research area. The talk went on for a duration of 1.5 hours and all the attendees listened to talk with utmost interest.
